card_text: If you control an "Eldlich" monster: Activate 1 of these effects;$N●Shuffle 3 of your banished "Eldlixir" Spells/Traps with different names into your Deck, and if you do, destroy all cards on the field.$N●Shuffle 3 of your banished "Golden Land" Spells/Traps with different names into your Deck, and if you do, halve your opponent's LP, then you gain LP equal to their LP.$NYou can only activate 1 "El Dorado Adelantado" per turn.
